projects.title: reCovers
projects.description: Designed and built a single-page site for a sustainable company focused on developing reusable shoe covers. Used headless CMS to allow the client to easily modify content. Communicated regularly with the client to integrate their goals into the design and functionality of the site. Continuing to manage the page.

projects.title: Gambit's Chronicles
projects.description: A blog dedicated to my pet milk snake, Gambit. Designed and built myself.

projects.title: Pig Game
projects.description: A 2-player game which involves dice rolls, adding up of scores and a winning/losing interface.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: 2-player tic-tac-toe game. Player name change, assigns player symbol, winner pop-up with rematch functionality. Additions: restart button added, player input fields changed to allow instant typing.

projects.title: Job Scraper
projects.description: WIP. A collaboration between myself and another developer to help me in my job-search.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A group project with the aim of building an app that displays weather data fetched from an API. Collaborated using Git.

projects.title: Recipe Library
projects.description: A web app that acts as a recipe library, displaying recipes based on API data and allowing filtering and sorting.

projects.title: The Crit & Cauldron
projects.description: A website relating to card games, miniatures, and role-playing games including a shop and a blog.

projects.title: The Code Magazine
projects.description: A simple blog built using basic concepts. Was the first project I built. (Instructor: Jonas Schmedtmann)

projects.title: Lisbon Chair Shop
projects.description: A simple e-commerce website built using some more web development techniques. (Instructor: Jonas Schmedtmann)

projects.title: Omnifood
projects.description: The big final project of one of the web development courses I completed which involved the process of building a website from start to finish. A food subscription service website. (Instructor: Jonas Schmedtmann)

projects.title: Guess My Number
projects.description: A small number-guessing game built through a JavaScript course. (Instructor: Jonas Schmedtmann)

projects.title: Bankist App
projects.description: A banking app that implements login, account closing, and transactions such as transfers, payments, and loans. (Instructor: Jonas Schmedtmann)

projects.title: Bankist Website
projects.description: A banking website that allows for account creation, and displays a minimalist interface with testimonials, slow-loading images, sticky navigation, and other DOM manipulation techniques. Changed some of the text to sound better and added a link to the web app. (Instructor: Jonas Schmedtmann)
